library(flexdashboard)

```{r load}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(mapview)
library(mapedit)
library(sf)
library(here)
library(glue)
library(fs)
library(vembedr)
source(here("functions.R"))

# paths
pts_csv <- here("data/pts.csv")

# read csv, convert to points
pts <- read_csv(pts_csv) %>% 
  st_as_sf(
    coords = c("lon", "lat"), remove=F, 
    crs=4326)
```

### **Welcome** {data-commentary-width=400}

map_all(pts)
